Sabbathkeeping With the Angels. I urge upon you to fulfill your Christian obligations to God. If there is no one 
                                                                           49
within a hundred miles of you who observes the Sabbath, the whole universe of heaven is in sympathy with you. Christ your Saviour and the heavenly angels are round about you. If you will call upon God in every time of need, He will be your helper. Practice the truth in your home. "Ye are My witnesses, saith the Lord."
